column9: Small place and simple interior with "correct" service. The stews we've tried were of course hot, but the taste was rather one-dimensional and quite fatty. The injera is quite sticky, and the sides consisted of cottage cheese and a simple salad.

The menu includes all the familiar favorites even if the names might not be familiar. The owners are Eritrean, but the food is similar to what one eats in Ethiopia. Good flavor, not overly spicy. Excellent injera, fresh and light. The doro wat sauce is...More
De hade bara en rätt att välja på till lunch. Den smakade okej men var ganska tråkig i längden, en...More
Har varit på Mesob och ätit eller beställt hämtmat på Mesob ett antal gånger nu. Blir aldrig besviken! Min favorit...More
Gick hit utan en aning om vad de serverar. Personalen var mycket hjälpsam och tipsade om rätter att testa. Maten...More
